title: vLLM
description: Deploy OpenAI-Compatible Blazing-Fast LLM Endpoints powered by vLLM

input.name: Model
input.description: Hugging Face model name

input.name: Tokenizer
input.description: Name or path of the Hugging Face tokenizer to use.

input.name: Tokenizer Mode
input.description: The tokenizer mode.

input.name: Skip Tokenizer Init
input.description: Skip initialization of tokenizer and detokenizer.

input.name: Trust Remote Code
input.description: Trust remote code from Hugging Face.

input.name: Download Directory
input.description: Directory to download and load the weights.

input.name: Load Format
input.description: The format of the model weights to load.

input.name: Data Type
input.description: Data type for model weights and activations.

input.name: KV Cache Data Type
input.description: Data type for KV cache storage.

input.name: Quantization Param Path
input.description: Path to the JSON file containing the KV cache scaling factors.

input.name: Max Model Length
input.description: Model context length.

input.name: Guided Decoding Backend
input.description: Which engine will be used for guided decoding by default.

input.name: Distributed Executor Backend
input.description: Backend to use for distributed serving.

input.name: Worker Use Ray
input.description: Deprecated, use --distributed-executor-backend=ray.

input.name: Ray Workers Use Nsight
input.description: If specified, use nsight to profile Ray workers.

input.name: Pipeline Parallel Size
input.description: Number of pipeline stages.

input.name: Tensor Parallel Size
input.description: Number of tensor parallel replicas.

input.name: Max Parallel Loading Workers
input.description: Load model sequentially in multiple batches.

input.name: Enable Prefix Caching
input.description: Enables automatic prefix caching.

input.name: Disable Sliding Window
input.description: Disables sliding window, capping to sliding window size.

input.name: Use V2 Block Manager
input.description: Use BlockSpaceMangerV2.

input.name: Num Lookahead Slots
input.description: Experimental scheduling config necessary for speculative decoding.

input.name: Seed
input.description: Random seed for operations.

input.name: Num GPU Blocks Override
input.description: If specified, ignore GPU profiling result and use this number of GPU blocks.

input.name: Max Num Batched Tokens
input.description: Maximum number of batched tokens per iteration.

input.name: Max Num Seqs
input.description: Maximum number of sequences per iteration.

input.name: Max Logprobs
input.description: Max number of log probs to return when logprobs is specified in SamplingParams.

input.name: Disable Log Stats
input.description: Disable logging statistics.

input.name: Quantization
input.description: Method used to quantize the weights.

input.name: RoPE Scaling
input.description: RoPE scaling configuration in JSON format.

input.name: RoPE Theta
input.description: RoPE theta. Use with rope_scaling.

input.name: Tokenizer Pool Size
input.description: Size of tokenizer pool to use for asynchronous tokenization.

input.name: Tokenizer Pool Type
input.description: Type of tokenizer pool to use for asynchronous tokenization.

input.name: Tokenizer Pool Extra Config
input.description: Extra config for tokenizer pool.

input.name: Enable LoRA
input.description: If True, enable handling of LoRA adapters.

input.name: Max LoRAs
input.description: Max number of LoRAs in a single batch.

input.name: Max LoRA Rank
input.description: Max LoRA rank.

input.name: LoRA Extra Vocab Size
input.description: Maximum size of extra vocabulary for LoRA adapters.

input.name: LoRA Data Type
input.description: Data type for LoRA.

input.name: Long LoRA Scaling Factors
input.description: Specify multiple scaling factors for LoRA adapters.

input.name: Max CPU LoRAs
input.description: Maximum number of LoRAs to store in CPU memory.

input.name: Fully Sharded LoRAs
input.description: Enable fully sharded LoRA layers.

input.name: Device
input.description: Device type for vLLM execution.

input.name: Scheduler Delay Factor
input.description: Apply a delay before scheduling next prompt.

input.name: Enable Chunked Prefill
input.description: Enable chunked prefill requests.

input.name: Speculative Model
input.description: The name of the draft model to be used in speculative decoding.

input.name: Num Speculative Tokens
input.description: The number of speculative tokens to sample from the draft model.

input.name: Speculative Draft Tensor Parallel Size
input.description: Number of tensor parallel replicas for the draft model.

input.name: Speculative Max Model Length
input.description: The maximum sequence length supported by the draft model.

input.name: Speculative Disable by Batch Size
input.description: Disable speculative decoding if the number of enqueue requests is larger than this value.

input.name: Ngram Prompt Lookup Max
input.description: Max size of window for ngram prompt lookup in speculative decoding.

input.name: Ngram Prompt Lookup Min
input.description: Min size of window for ngram prompt lookup in speculative decoding.

input.name: Speculative Decoding Acceptance Method
input.description: Specify the acceptance method for draft token verification in speculative decoding.

input.name: Typical Acceptance Sampler Posterior Threshold
input.description: Set the lower bound threshold for the posterior probability of a token to be accepted.

input.name: Typical Acceptance Sampler Posterior Alpha
input.description: A scaling factor for the entropy-based threshold for token acceptance.

input.name: Model Loader Extra Config
input.description: Extra config for model loader.

input.name: Preemption Mode
input.description: If 'recompute', the engine performs preemption-aware recomputation. If 'save', the engine saves activations into the CPU memory as preemption happens.

input.name: Preemption Check Period
input.description: How frequently the engine checks if a preemption happens.

input.name: Preemption CPU Capacity
input.description: The percentage of CPU memory used for the saved activations.

input.name: Max Log Length
input.description: Max number of characters or ID numbers being printed in log.

input.name: Disable Logging Request
input.description: Disable logging requests.

input.name: Tokenizer Name
input.description: Tokenizer repo to use a different tokenizer than the model's default

input.name: Tokenizer Revision
input.description: Tokenizer revision to load

input.name: Custom Chat Template
input.description: Custom chat jinja template

input.name: GPU Memory Utilization
input.description: Sets GPU VRAM utilization

input.name: Block Size
input.description: Token block size for contiguous chunks of tokens

input.name: Swap Space
input.description: CPU swap space size (GiB) per GPU

input.name: Enforce Eager
input.description: Always use eager-mode PyTorch. If False (0), will use eager mode and CUDA graph in hybrid for maximal performance and flexibility

input.name: CUDA Graph Max Content Length
input.description: Maximum context length covered by CUDA graphs. If a sequence has context length larger than this, we fall back to eager mode

input.name: Disable Custom All Reduce
input.description: Enables or disables custom all reduce

input.name: Default Final Batch Size
input.description: Default and Maximum batch size for token streaming to reduce HTTP calls

input.name: Default Starting Batch Size
input.description: Batch size for the first request, which will be multiplied by the growth factor every subsequent request

input.name: Default Batch Size Growth Factor
input.description: Growth factor for dynamic batch size

input.name: Raw OpenAI Output
input.description: Raw OpenAI output instead of just the text

input.name: OpenAI Response Role
input.description: Role of the LLM's Response in OpenAI Chat Completions

input.name: OpenAI Served Model Name Override
input.description: Overrides the name of the served model from model repo/path to specified name, which you will then be able to use the value for the `model` parameter when making OpenAI requests

input.name: Max Concurrency
input.description: Max concurrent requests per worker. vLLM has an internal queue, so you don't have to worry about limiting by VRAM, this is for improving scaling/load balancing efficiency

input.name: Enable Expert Parallel
input.description: Enable Expert Parallel for MoE models

input.name: Model Revision
input.description: Model revision (branch) to load

input.name: Base Path
input.description: Storage directory for Huggingface cache and model

input.name: Disable Log Requests
input.description: Enables or disables vLLM request logging

input.name: Enable Auto Tool Choice
input.description: Enables or disables auto tool choice

input.name: Tool Call Parser
input.description: Tool call parser

input.name: Reasoning Parser
input.description: Parser for reasoning-capable models (enables reasoning mode)
